Anei Kankō and Hateruma Kaiun together have four departures daily from

harbor. If you buy a round-trip ticket, be sure to catch the same operator's boat on the way back. Travel time is 60 minutes.

Hateruma's airport is no longer served by any scheduled flights.
There are no buses or car rentals on Hateruma, so for trips beyond the village, rent a bicycle or moped.
